Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.6.0:
   Preliminary 6.2 update
   Fix a bug where an incorrect encounter would be displayed if it is from the same zone. If you added a DSR entry early, you may need to re-add it, because FF Logs changed the encounter id.
   API 7 update
- 2.0.5.0:
   Add swap groups, allowing you to dynamically change the layout in the main window.
   Adding encounters in the layout is now easier.
   Some other minor improvements.
